ygData.subject: View Mulitple Web UI Instances on the Same Browser?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I configured to run multilpe instances of Web UI instances locally (1 Heritrix instance/Web UI instance) via different ports. When I login on one instance,

Hi,

I configured to run multilpe instances of Web UI instances locally (1
=
Heritrix instance/Web UI instance) via different ports.

When I login on on=
e instance, the login for another instance will be
(sort of?) expired.  My =
original purpose of having multiple Web UI
instances is to view different "=
real-time" reports of different jobs.

Then, I tried to block all the cooki=
e from localhost/127.0.0.1.  The
Web UI instances started using sessions, b=
ut the problem is still
there - logging on one instance will log off on ano=
ther instance.

Any suggestion? (Besides running 2 different kinds of brows=
ers)

Thanks in advance.

- H
